name: XP Simulator
description:
In this blast to the digital past, you embark onto a mouse cursor and fight your way through the Windows XP stars screensaver while trying to return to Earth. You will encounter the familiar icons and sounds of the Windows XP experience, the difference now being that they are on a murderous, ballistic, and interstellar rampage!

### Controls

**W,A,S,D / :arrow_up:,:arrow_right:,:arrow_down:,:arrow_left:** - Movement

**SHIFT** - Slowed Speed

**SPACE / Z / X / M1 / M2** - Fire Windows Panes (once in a while, a high-damage intact window will be sent out)

## Authors

Sam Anderson,

Justin Rozeboom
